name: WilliamJessupSportsNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Without having to traverse the internet, this flash briefing will allow you to get all the new updates from your favorite sports at William Jessup University. The recent news article that is made after every game will be read aloud and users will get their updates within seconds. All sports are featured in this flash briefing, but you may disable ones that you are not interested in. Just make sure to check this flash briefing every week as games and events take place at that time. Just say "Alexa, what is my flash briefing" or "Alexa, what is in the news?" and all the recent news you missed is a couple words away.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
